info.+content: In the Year FC 60, much of mankind inhabits space colonies which orbit the Earth. Dominance over the colonies is decided once every four years by a large tournament in which each nation sends a single representative to fight the others with a giant robot called a Gundam. Domon Kashuu is selected to represent Neo-Japan in one of these tournaments, but he fights less to ensure his nation's victory than to find his brother, who has been blamed for the deaths of Domon's parents and the disappearance of a very dangerous weapon, the Dark Gundam or Devil Gundam.
#1: "Flying In The Sky" by Yoshifumi Ushima (eps 1-25)
#1: "Umi Yori Mo Fukaku (海よりも深く; Deeper Than The Ocean)" by Etsuko Sai (eps 1-25)
#2: "Kimi No Naka No Eien (君の中の永遠; The Eternity in You)" by Inoue Takehide (eps 26-49)
"Hoshizora no Requiem" (星屑のレクイエム; Starry Sky Requiem) by Yuri Amano
"Inochi no Tobira" (魂の扉; The Gate to the Soul) by Yuri Amano
"Shōrisha-tachi no Banka" (勝利者たちの挽歌; Winners' Elergy) by Shūji Ōyama (eps 22,35)
"Xiang Gang Guan Guang Ge" (香港觀光歌; Hong Kong Tourism Song) by Chen Yi, Li Chongwen, Huang Wenguang and Zhong Weiling
"Yume no Hazama de - In my dream" (夢のはざまで～In my dream～) by Yuri Amano (ep 31)
"Zhan Dou Nan Hai" (戰鬥男孩; Fighting Boys) by Ye Fusheng
